Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: khubwatoto khwaloonga Omundu okhuloonga okhulayi muno
Halali balia Abasuubila mana nibakhola amalayi, abo balinyoola omurungo kulawa tawe
Mana	nishina	nikhwakhamala shilakhuyingasia inyanga yo murungo
Kho Nyasaye Shali Omubusia Umalayo okhushila Ababusia boosi
